A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Was really excited after consensus great reviews.  However\, this movie was a complete dud.  Disney is ruining all my childhood heroes and collecting billions of dollars to do it.  Running time was way too long.  So much of the movie just seemed overly contrived and far fetched.  Mark Hamil and Carrie Fisher were great with the limited material they were afforded.  Save your money\, wait for it on Netflix.  Summation\, notch above Star Wars prequels\, but not by much. Awful.
